item.title: Drupal deployments in AWS ECS with AWS Copilot
item.description: Example of a stateful application deployment in ECS Fargate using AWS Copilot CLI from a docker-compose setup

item.title: Temporal.io workflow with Openfaas functions
item.description: Simple setup to test the recently released workflow engine Temporal (from Uber's Cadence creators) with Openfaas serverless framework in a local k3d kubernetes cluster.
